name: The Incomplete Lunar-月影待蚀-TheFirstChapter
description:
This game is including Chinese and English subtitles!

这款游戏包含中文和英文字幕！

🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮🏮

This is a visual novel game with the theme of furry characters and same-sex love. You will play a human character who is about to become a furry man in the game, break into a small town in southwest China by mistake, and get involved in the local wonderful past.

这是一款包含兽人角色与同性恋爱主题的视觉小说游戏，你将在游戏内扮演一名即将变成兽人的人类角色，误闯中国西南部小镇，并卷入当地的奇妙往事之中。游戏系统提供存档和读档功能，你可以在游戏过程中进行不同的选择，触发不同的剧情。

In itch, we provide a trial version of the first chapter of the game. If you want to support the content of the full version, you can go to our steam page! Thank you so much!

🏮 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1841520/__The_Incomplete_Lunar/  

在itch里我们提供本游戏的第一章节试玩版，如果你想要支持完整版本的内容，可以前往我们的steam首页！感谢！

 🏮  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1841520/__The_Incomplete_Lunar/ 

🌕Synopsis🌕

Frustrated in the real world, you accidentally receive a call that is about to change your destiny. You will follow the guidance to a traditional Chinese mysterious southwest town.

The optimistic and cheerful leopard always looks lost. The serious and silent bull Hongye always retaliates against you,

The knowledgeable pub owner Salamander was exhausted about the red haired passenger.

In your dreams, there is always a mysterious tile cat.

On the eve of the eclipse, the five will gradually reveal a romantic past together with you.

And it seems that your feelings with them are also changing subtly in the roaring bamboo forest.

"According to our rules,

a huge fire will rise in that evening.

This is the moon we made ourselves."

🌕剧情简介🌕

在现实世界里失意的你意外接到一通即将改变命运的来电，你顺从着指引来到一个传统的神秘西南小镇。

乐观开朗的豹子毛蛋却总是看起来很失落，严肃沉默的公牛鸿野总是对你进行着憎恨的报复，

博学多识的酒馆老板蝾螈，被红毛旅客折腾得不像样。

而在你的梦里，总是出现着一只神秘的瓦猫。

五人在月蚀来临的前夕，将逐渐和你携手揭晓出一段浪漫往事的样貌。

而你和他们的感情，似乎也在竹林呼啸中发生着微妙的变化。

“根据我们的规矩，那晚会升起巨大的火堆，这是我们自己造的月亮。”

🥮🥮🥮

This update contains the complete contents of The Incomplete Lunar(Steam)

Notice:

1： A total of 16 endings and 2 new characters have been added in this update, and the original scene and vertical drawing have been painted again.

2： When using the fast forward key, in order to ensure that the plot can jump quickly and smoothly, the figure may stay in the original position.

3： Fixed possible problems about incomplete display of English subtitles in the demo version.

🥮🥮🥮

本次更新包含《月影待蚀》完整内容(Steam)

说明：
一：本次更新一共添加了16个结局，2个新角色，并对原有的场景和立绘进行了再次作画。
二：在使用快进键时，为了保证剧情能快速流畅地跳转，人物立绘可能会滞留在原有位置。
三：修复了demo版本中英文字幕可能会出现的显示不全情况。
四：我们创建了QQ讨论群：606861913，大家可以在群里尽情讨论，如果在游戏中遇到任何问题，也可以在群聊里向我们进行反馈～

🥮🥮🥮

DAKIDAKI( Consist of DADA the painter 🎨and KIKI the writer✍️ ) made our first own game! It's not easy to make independent furry games in China. Please give us your opinions!Thank you so much!

DAKIDAKI（是由DADA-画手🎨和KIKI-编剧✍️二人组成）制作了我们自己的第一款游戏！独立兽游制作不易，请告诉我们你的意见！非常感谢！

🌑🌒🌓🌔🌕🌖🌗🌘🌑
